PROCEDURE:

   In Eclipse, perform the following:

1. In the File menu, select New->Project
2. In the resulting dialog, select Web->Dynamic Web Project
3. Click on Next

This yields the following (taken from the log file):

Jeffrey, Can you try to confirm this problem on our Mac? Thx.
Please defer this bug to post M5, I'm still trying to find a MAC to reproduce this bug.
Thanks Nitin. I have yet to get my hands on a Mac machine.

Robert,
I only have access to a 10.4 machine, but both the latest 1.0.2 RC and 1.5M6 builds created projects fine.  Does it work properly with a more recent maintenance stream build?

I am seeing this bug on a Windows XP machine running eclipse Version: 3.1.2
Build id: M20060118-1600. I was able to create dynamic web projects until I installed BIRT and TPTP.
Mark, please open a separate bug for the problem with BIRT and TPTP installed.  This one is for the Mac itself with just WTP installed.  Being a blocker, I'd rather keep it focussed on that.
Resolving.  Robert, please reopen if you're still running into this problem.
Changing OS from Mac OS to Mac OS X as per bug 185991
